description1: I am a passionate web developer with a strong background in developing high-quality websites and applications. Over the years, I have honed my skills in JavaScript, React, Angular, and more.
description2: I have professional experience working in various countries including Morocco, Italy, and France. My roles have involved developing responsive websites, integrating third-party APIs, ensuring data security, and optimizing performance.
bachelor_degree: Bachelor's degree in Applied Computer Methods for Business Management
company_agenzia: Agenzia Investigativa Delle Alpi, TURIN, ITALY
analyze_and_develop_components: • Analyze and develop components using appropriate languages ​​(C#, JavaScript/Angular, Oracle, PL/SQL).
work_iteratively: • Work iteratively using the principles of agile methodology to adapt quickly respond to changing needs and optimize development processes.
creation_of_responsive_websites: • Creation of responsive websites using Angular (v8), JavaScript, PHP, Ajax, jQuery, WordPress, HTML5 and CSS.
openapi_integration: • OPENAPI integration to facilitate communication with third-party servers.
development_of_application_for_analysis: • Development of an application for the analysis and management of GPS data using Node.js, React.js and Bootstrap, allowing better coordination and monitoring of field surveys.
using_javascript_html_css: • Using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP and MySQL to design and develop screens functional and user-friendly administration systems.
creating_dynamic_layouts: • Creating dynamic layouts and features using JavaScript to enhance user experience.
using_php_to_interact_with_mysql: • Using PHP to interact with the MySQL database and manage read operations, and updating data.
using_angularjs_ionic: • Using AngularJS, Ionic, Cordova and Firebase to design and develop a mobile application complete hybrid.
integration_of_firebase: • Intégration de Firebase pour assurer le stockage des données, l'authentification sécurisée et les notifications push.
flexible_adaptation: • Adaptation flexible aux besoins changeants du client grâce à une approche itérative et agile.
aero_school_description: Located in the heart of the phosphate city of Khouribga, AERO SCHOOL KHOURIBGA is the only institute in the region and the city for the training of Commercial Flight Crew. It is a key hub and a recognized center of expertise in the fields of aviation and tourism.
adas_app_description1: ADAS is a Digital Address System that enables you to transform any location into a digital address. By use of geocoding technology, the platform can transform any location on the face of the earth into an easy and memorable digital address.
adas_app_description2: Take your life to the next level with a digital address and skip the hassle of making complex explanations whenever you give out directions. A sample address looks like UG-890-768 where UG is the country code for Uganda.
name: Name
